mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user(user_id, country, province, city, gender, nick_name, avatar_url, score) VALUES (#{userId},#{country}, #{province}, #{city}, #{gender}, #{nickName}, #{avatarUrl}, 0)
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET country = #{country}, province = #{province}, city=#{city}, gender = #{gender}, nick_name = #{nickName}, avatar_url = #{avatarUrl} WHERE user_id = #{userId}
UPDATE user SET score = #{score} WHERE user_id = #{userId}
